pageTitle: Progressive Insurance Legal Tech | Ryan Andrew Pretzer Portfolio
metaDescription: Case study: Designed and implemented legal review systems for state filing processes at Progressive Insurance, reducing review cycles by 60% and compliance issues by 75%.

hero.title: Progressive Insurance Legal Tech
hero.subtitle: Designed and implemented new business application and legal review systems for state filing processes, reducing review cycles by 60% and compliance issues by 75%.

sections.title: Project Overview
sections.challenge: Progressive Insurance needed to streamline legal review processes for state filing requirements across all 50 states. Each state had unique regulatory requirements, filing deadlines, and approval processes that created bottlenecks in product development and marketing campaigns.
sections.approach: Designed collaborative workflow that integrated legal review into development process rather than treating it as separate approval gate. Created early-warning system that flagged potential legal issues during content creation.

sections.title: The Legal Compliance Challenge
problems: 50 different state regulatory frameworks to navigate
Manual coordination between legal and business teams
No visibility into review status or bottlenecks
Missed filing deadlines creating compliance risk

innovations.title: Early Warning System
innovations.description: Built intelligent flagging that identified potential legal issues during content creation, alerting creators to state-specific requirements before submission.

innovations.title: Collaborative Review Workflow
innovations.description: Designed parallel review processes that allowed legal and business stakeholders to work simultaneously rather than sequentially.

innovations.title: Smart Routing & Automation
innovations.description: Implemented intelligent routing that automatically assigned reviews based on content type, state requirements, and reviewer expertise.

impact.organizationalImpact: The success of this project led to similar process transformation initiatives across other business units, demonstrating the scalability of human-centered design approaches to complex enterprise challenges.
